member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_UNIT_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the units in which the timed text is measured.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_UNIT_TYPE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_UNIT_TYPE_PIXELS
member.summary: The timed text is measured in pixels.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_UNIT_TYPE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_UNIT_TYPE_PERCENTAGE
member.summary: The timed text is measured as a percentage.
